texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you find that someone has done a recursive chmod or chown on a server, don't fret. You can set almost everything back to its original permissions and ownership by doing the following:
texts.text: If you find that someone has done a recursive chmod or chown on a server, don't fret. You can set almost everything back to its original permissions and ownership by doing the following:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Depending on how many packages are installed as well as the speed of your disk I/O, this may take a while to complete.
texts.text: Depending on how many packages are installed as well as the speed of your disk I/O, this may take a while to complete.
